# Cloak of Displacement, Minor
## Overview
**Aura** faint illusion; **CL** 3rd

**Slot** shoulders; 

**Price** 24,000 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

This item appears to be a normal cloak, but when worn by a character, its magical properties distort and warp light waves. This displacement works similar to the *[[Blur (Spell)|blur]]* spell, granting a 20% miss chance on attacks against the wearer. It functions continually.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Blur (Spell)|blur]]*

**Cost** 12,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 507
